name: css
toBase64
Upload Btn
format:
<body>
<button id="but" class="md-raised md-button md-ink-ripple" onclick="importData()">Upload</button>    

<script>
let restoreScope = scope;

function importData() {
  let input = document.createElement('input');
  input.type = 'file';
  input.id = 'restoreBtn';
  input.multiple = 'multiple';

  input.onchange = () => {
    const files = Array.from(input.files);

    const uploadPromises = files.map((file) => readAndUploadFile(file));

    Promise.all(uploadPromises)
      .then(() => {
        console.log('All files uploaded successfully.');
      })
      .catch((error) => {
        console.error('Error uploading files:', error);
      });
  };

  input.click();
}

function readAndUploadFile(file) {
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    const fReader = new FileReader();

    fReader.onload = function (event) {
      const payload = event.target.result;
      const filename = file.name;

      restoreScope
        .send({ payload, filename })
        .then(() => {
          console.log(`File "${filename}" uploaded successfully.`);
          resolve();
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          console.error(`Error uploading file "${filename}":`, error);
          reject(error);
        });
    };

    fReader.readAsArrayBuffer(file);
  });
}
</script>
</body>
